title: The Maturity vs. Maintenance Paradox (Dormancy Decay)
signal: Saturation Index (28.65) indicates a HIGHLY mature market.
meaning: The market is saturated with identities. New enrollment is no longer the primary mission.
danger: If maintenance (LPI) doesn't keep pace, the database becomes 'Static Junk'.
senior_advice: Stop spending on enrollment. Redirect 80% budget to 'Lifecycle Re-engagement' and Aadhaar Paperless Auth.

title: The Minor-Compliance Strategic Time-Bomb
meaning: The future of the Aadhaar ecosystem depends on users who are currently non-compliant (Mandatory Biometric Updates).
danger: Massive identity blockage when this cohort turns 18 without MBU completion.
senior_advice: Integrate Biometric Updates into school board exam registrations (Class 10/12).

title: High-Density Infrastructure Risks
signal: Just 39.4% of districts handle 80% of Aadhaar workload.
danger: Regional disasters in top hubs (Mumbai/Delhi/Bengaluru) can halt national update averages.
senior_advice: Decentralize to Tier-2 cities with 'Incentivized Rural Update Centers'.
